entry.title: Tone: In a snap election called after the death of Hugo Chávez, Nicolás Maduro is '''elected''' President of Venezuela.
entry.summary:
In a snap election called after the death of Hugo Chávez, Nicolás Maduro is '''elected''' President of Venezuela.

← Previous revision Revision as of 08:50, 15 April 2013
Line 7: Line 7:
 
|alt = Indian actor Pran
  
|alt = Indian actor Pran
 
}}
  
}}
  +
{{*mp|April 14}} In a [[snap election]] called after the [[Death and state funeral of Hugo Chávez|death of Hugo Chávez]], [[Nicolás Maduro]] is '''[[Venezuelan presidential election, 2013|elected]]''' [[List of Presidents of Venezuela|President of Venezuela]].
 
{{*mp|April 12}} The [[Government of India]] announces [[Bollywood]] actor '''[[Pran]]''' ''(pictured)'' as the winner of the 2012 [[Dadasaheb Phalke Award]].
  
{{*mp|April 12}} The [[Government of India]] announces [[Bollywood]] actor '''[[Pran]]''' ''(pictured)'' as the winner of the 2012 [[Dadasaheb Phalke Award]].
 
{{*mp|April 9}} Five UN peacekeepers and seven civilian staff members are '''[[United Nations Mission in South Sudan|killed]]''' by rebels in [[Jonglei]], South Sudan.
  
{{*mp|April 9}} Five UN peacekeepers and seven civilian staff members are '''[[United Nations Mission in South Sudan|killed]]''' by rebels in [[Jonglei]], South Sudan.
Line 12: Line 13:
 
{{*mp|April 9}} A gunman kills 13 people in '''[[Velika Ivanča shooting|a spree shooting]]''' in the village of [[Velika Ivanča]], Serbia.
  
{{*mp|April 9}} A gunman kills 13 people in '''[[Velika Ivanča shooting|a spree shooting]]''' in the village of [[Velika Ivanča]], Serbia.
 
{{*mp|April 8}} '''[[Sudanese nomadic conflicts#April 2|Tribal violence]]''' in [[Darfur]], Sudan, kills at least 163 people and displaces 50,000 others.
  
{{*mp|April 8}} '''[[Sudanese nomadic conflicts#April 2|Tribal violence]]''' in [[Darfur]], Sudan, kills at least 163 people and displaces 50,000 others.
−
{{*mp|April 8}} Former [[Prime Minister of the United Kingdom|British Prime Minister]] '''[[Margaret Thatcher]]''' dies at the age of 87.
 +
 
</ul>
  
</ul>
